prompts.text: Please analyze the following code for potential security vulnerabilities and suggest improvements: [CODE]
Create a comprehensive unit test suite for this function, including edge cases and error conditions: [FUNCTION]
Explain the following complex algorithm in simple terms, as if teaching to a junior developer: [ALGORITHM]
Optimize this database query for better performance while maintaining its functionality: [QUERY]
Review this API design and suggest improvements following RESTful principles and best practices: [API_SPEC]
Generate comprehensive documentation for this code module, including usage examples and edge cases: [MODULE]
Analyze this user story and break it down into technical requirements and acceptance criteria: [USER_STORY]
Suggest refactoring opportunities in this code to improve maintainability and readability: [CODE]
Design a scalable system architecture for the following requirements, including diagrams and component descriptions: [REQUIREMENTS]
Review this pull request and provide detailed feedback on code quality, performance, and potential issues: [PR_DESCRIPTION]
